title: Voronoi / Delaunay
description:
A Voronoi / Delaunay generator. The delaunay triangulation of a set of points is first calculated using the Bowyer-Watson alogorithm, and a Voronoi diagram is then generated by joining the circumcenters of any adjacent triangles.

The basic principle of the Delaunay triangulation is to first create a superTriangle to encompass all points, then for each point determine which triangle circumcenters a point is within, remove these triangles and create a new subset of triangles from the leftover edges.
